imdb.title: Kuînzu bureido: Rurô no senshi
imdb.plot: Multiple women from around the continent come together to prepare for the Queen's Blade tournament, a tournament that tests the skills of the warriors.

episodes.title: Kien: rurou no senshi
episodes.plot: Reina is walking outside of town when she encounters Melona, and tells her she is going to defeat her for attacking travelers. Melona taunts Reina for being such a weak fighter, and says she only wants to fight decent warriors as she is a participant in Queen's Blade, a tournament held every four years to decide who is going to be the next Queen.

episodes.title: Souto: Musha Miko
episodes.plot: Tomoe, a Warrior Priestess, and Shizuka, a Demon Priestess who has defected are meditating in the shrine they tend to. Tomoe decides she is going to travel to the mainland to compete in the Queen's Blade tournament.

episodes.title: Tsuya Shuu: Rekisen no Youhei
episodes.plot: Tomoe and Shizuka arrive on the mainland. Tomoe attempts to blend in by choosing an outfit more fitting for the mainland when she overhears a Queen's Blade battle being undertaken.

episodes.title: Soukoku: Raiun no Shou
episodes.plot: Claudette arrives where Reina and Listy were the night before and encounters Echidna who explains she let Reina go so that Claudette could become countess and hence reward her.

episodes.title: So Ju: Kodai no Oujo
episodes.plot: Reina is missing, swept down the river at the bottom of the ravine, and Echidna goes searching for her. Reina has been enslaved by Menace inside her pyramid.

episodes.title: Yakusoku: Mori no Bannin
episodes.plot: Reina recovers outside the pyramid, on the edge of a forest, and a Maid of Temptation, Airi is turning the forest into a swamp. She is attacked by the Nowa, Watchmen of the Forest.

episodes.title: Kourin: Koumyou no Tenshi
episodes.plot: In heaven, Nanael is summoned by Seraphim, the head angel who plans to exile her as she has forced people to fight each other. Seraphim threatens to send her to hell unless she goes to where the Swamp Witch is and find out what the Swamp Witch is up to.

episodes.title: Anyaku: Kiba no Ansatsu Mono
episodes.plot: Nanael is following Reina on her journey. Tomoe and Shizuka are continuing on their journey as well, and rest at a hot spring. Elina is also on the road and encounters Tomoe and tells her to leave the springs but before she goes Elina realizes that Tomoe has fought Reina.

episodes.title: Sekishin: Bukiya to Koutetsu Hime
episodes.plot: Steel Princess Ymir announces that she will take vengeance against Cattleya for selling low cost weapons, compared to the Steel Mountain ones that she creates.

episodes.title: Kaigan: Ryuu no Ichigeki
episodes.plot: Listy, Tomoe and Shizuka all reach the edge of Gainos, and Reina and Nanael catch up with them. Listy tells them to leave, so Reina challenges her to a fight for Queen's Blade and Listy accepts.

episodes.title: Ikazuchi: Shitou no Hate
episodes.plot: Listy is fighting Claudette when she realizes she is starting to go numb from some poison that Echidna has given her, and Claudette defeats her. Reina uses the Elven medicine she has to heal Listy.

episodes.title: Kaimon: Joô e no michi
episodes.plot: Cattleya and Ymir head to Gainos to help out those being attacked by the Army of the Dead. Melona, Menace, Airi and the Army of the Dead continue the onslaught against Reina, Listy, Elina, Claudette and Tomoe.
